quote: It hurt her to stir up these feelings, but yet she knew that that was the best part of her soul, and that that part of her soul would quickly be smothered in the life she was leading.
quote_letters: IT HURT HER TO STIR UP THESE FEELINGS BUT YET SHE KNEW THAT THAT WAS THE BEST PART OF HER SOUL AND THAT THAT PART OF HER SOUL WOULD QUICKLY BE SMOTHERED IN THE LIFE SHE WAS LEADING
